sdg.title: No Poverty
sdg.description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere by promoting economic growth, social protection systems, and sustainable livelihoods.

sdg.title: Zero Hunger
sdg.description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture worldwide.

sdg.title: Good Health and Well-being
sdg.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages through healthcare access and health promotion.

sdg.title: Quality Education
sdg.description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.

sdg.title: Gender Equality
sdg.description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls through equal rights and opportunities.

sdg.title: Clean Water and Sanitation
sdg.description: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all communities.

sdg.title: Affordable and Clean Energy
sdg.description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all people.

sdg.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
sdg.description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full employment and decent work for all.

sdg.title: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
sdg.description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation.

sdg.title: Reduced Inequalities
sdg.description: Reduce inequality within and among countries through inclusive policies and equal opportunities.

sdg.title: Sustainable Cities and Communities
sdg.description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable for all residents.

sdg.title: Responsible Consumption and Production
sdg.description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns through responsible resource use.

sdg.title: Climate Action
sdg.description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts through mitigation and adaptation.

sdg.title: Life Below Water
sdg.description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development.

sdg.title: Life on Land
sdg.description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems and biodiversity.

sdg.title: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions
sdg.description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies, access to justice and effective institutions.

sdg.title: Partnerships for the Goals
sdg.description: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize global partnerships for sustainable development.
